name: COLOURSHIFT (Cian Moriarty)
description:
If the resolution is bugged press the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner.

Left Arrow Key - Rotate Anti-Clockwise

Right Arrow Key - Rotate Clockwise

Down Arrow Key - Switch Colour

Up Arrow Key - Shoot

Music: Eric Skiff - We're all under the stars - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
